Name: Emma Centrella
Details: Born 3008, ascended to Magestrix in 3040. The foremost daughter of Kyalla Centrella, Emma is a hero of the abortive Magistracy-Confederation War of 3035. After overthrowing her mother in 3040 thanks to Kyalla's intensifying paranoia, Emma took the throne of the Magestrix and has ruled the Magistracy of Canopus ably ever since.
